static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarReminders::SmsAlerts::STATE ( ) [static]

The state of this alert.

It starts out as 0 = Scheduled, then when the alarm goes off, it changes to 1= Fired, and then when the user dismisses the alarm it changes to 2 = Dismissed. Type: INTEGER
